cc:Work.dc:title: GNU GRUB components
cc:Work.dc:description: Illustrates the components of GNU GRUB and their location

text.tspan: by Shmuel Csaba Otto Traian; GFDL 1.3 & CC-BY-SA 3.0; created 2013-09-11, updated 2014-07-27
Locations of boot.img, core.img and the /boot/grub directory
Example 1: An MBR-partitioned hard disk with sector size of 512 or 4096 bytes
Example 2: A GPT-partitioned hard disk with sector size of 512 or 4096 bytes
